title: i have no champions in champion select
body: It's so frustrating, when the new client came in. First it was dc's from loading screen and you can't log in back in the game, which resulted lower queue priority, now I have no champions in champion select, ahhahahahahah, 2 times in a row, i can't take this anymore , will i able to play normal again ever?

replies.body:
Wow, yeah that's pretty frustrating.  It looks like some game assets could be failing to load during champion select.  To start, I recommend enabling [low spec mode](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) mode incase the really fancy stuff is not rendering properly.  

I then recommend downloading the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and running a repair to fix up any bad assets.

You'll want to test this in a custom game though to prevent anymore penalties.  Let me know if you have any questions!
